name: Blue Man Adventures
description:
A simple platform/runner game made for #BrackeysGameJam.

The player can obtain 3 different abilities:

  • Rewind.
  • Dash.
  • Change Perspective (Alternate between Platform and Runner).

For now, the game have 2 zones and the tutorial but after the game jam I will work more in this.

Also, you can play with the keyboard or a USB joystick.
